Quite satisfactory
Doctor is punctual . No waiting. Clinic is very neat and clean.
Treatment is perfect. Fee structure is reasonable

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am thrilled to endorse *Dr. Sruthi*, an exceptional dentist who exemplifies excellence, professionalism, and warmth. Her remarkable expertise has empowered her to tackle even the most complex dental issues with ease, instilling confidence in patients like me, especially seniors. Dr. Sruti's extraordinary skills and compassionate approach have not only resolved my dental concerns but also restored my smile, living up to the name 'Smile Align.' I am deeply grateful and impressed by her exceptional care, expertise, and dedication to ensuring patient comfort. *Kudos to Dr. Sruthi and her co working group*
*Dr. INAYATHULLA M PROFESSOR DEPARTMENT OF CIVIL ENGINEERING, DIRECTOR WATER INSTITUTE UVCE BANGALORE UNIVERSITY*

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Shruthi explained the issue very well and suggested what treatment is necessary for the time being.

Recommended!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It was good experience, doctor explained everything before surgery,  checked whether I'm comfortable throughout the procedure, the surgery was neatly done I will definitely recommend him.Its good to have such surgeon who has a smily face and treats the patient ever kindly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had visited Dr. Shivanand V for my impacted canine exposure and bracketing  surgery & I have been his patient over the months to get my braces treatment also done.

Dr. is very calm, composed, friendly & extremely professional. One thing that I personally appreciate the most about him is that he genuinely cares for the well being of his patients & advises only those procedures which might prove to be of help to his patients depending upon each individual’s case, which in my opinion is something that sets him apart from the rest.

Dr. Rajnikant B R, who performed my oral surgery for the impacted canine exposure is yet another accomplished Doctor who is very friendly & jovial spirited. He makes an effort to keep the patient comfortable during the surgery by creating a light-hearted environment and engaging the patient in regular conversations. 

Dr. Shruthi K V also played a vital role in my surgery as a supporting hand and ensured that I remained calm & comfortable during the entire surgery. She has previously assisted my sibling with RC & crown fixing. She too regularly follows up to see if the patient is doing well post treatment. 

All in all, I’ve had an amazing experience with all the doctors at Smile Align Clinic & I’m hoping to get extra ordinary results post completion of my metallic braces treatment. Would definitely recommend these doctors to anyone looking for a seamless dental experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor was excellent and experience while he was talking he started off his surgery.very friendly .i was very comfortable getting treated.i will 100% give him full satisfaction.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am undergoing the braces treatment under Dr Shivanand V, since July 23rd, must say he is extremely skilled, knowledgeable,  very compassionate,  he ensures that patient will be at their comfort level and undergoes painless procedures. Based on the progression of my smile currently, I'm very happy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Weeks before I visited SmileAlign Dental for the first time, my anxiety had been building. I knew I had put off a cleaning for too long, my pain tolerance is low and I had bad experiences with other places before. I did a ton of research to find the most reputable and most gentle dentist I could find and it led me here. I live in Electronic city, by the way and made the trek all the way to Hebbal for the visit. And I’m so, so glad I did. The associate dentist took her time to explain everything to me, calm me down, and give clear guidance. She has such a comforting presence and I couldn’t have asked for anyone better. For my actual procedure, Dr. Shivanand came in and (wow, truly) he’s the best dentist I’ve ever had. He listened to every concern I had, no matter how silly I thought I sounded, always checked to make sure I was okay and I swear has the most steady and gentle way of working ever. I could tell that it could have been so uncomfortable (and even painful) IF he wasn’t the one doing it. I’ll never ever go anywhere else and could not recommend this clinic more!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Iam currently at 9 months through my Invisalign treatment journey with SmileAlign Clinic, and the experience has exceeded my expectations.

Dr Shivananda is very patient, gentle and comprehensive in his treatment. While I was initially concerned about the level of compliance required for Invisalign to be effective, integrating it into part of my daily routine has turned out to be straightforward after the first couple of months from starting the treatment. In my experience, inculcating the habit (of removing/replacing aligners during mealtimes) is relatively easy once it has been formed.

My full treatment is estimated to take around 2 years, but I am already seeing significant gains, especially on my front teeth. Side benefits of Invisalign include (a) tremendous improvement in health of my gums with the increased attention and guidance from Dr Shivananda, and (b) greater attention in keeping to regular mealtimes (and avoiding snacks in between!).

Prices for both Invisalign and generic dental treatments are also very competitive / reasonable, in my opinion. I would highly recommend SmileAlign Clinic as a one-stop solution for any dental and orthodontic procedures.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Shruti was very welcoming and explained the situation well. She advised for an X-ray and a Scan. I am so glad that I went for the X-ray and the Scan, that revealed an additional problem. Dr. Shivanad met me the next day and advised the surgery. 

There are no words to express for Dr. Rathna, the Surgeon. She was very professional, highly caring and very high on customer service. Throughout the two extractions in an hour, one was a very delicate surgery, Dr. Rathna handled it very gracefully. She gave me enough breathing space and helped in reducing my stress. Much respect Dr. Rathna. 

Dr. Shruti was in constant touch to make sure that I was doing well during the course of my treatment. Thank you so much Dr. Shruti. 

In this day and age, very few dental clinics operate like this. Dr. Shivanand, this speaks very high of your vision, leadership and the customer delight you offer to us. I have recommended this place to my family and friends. 

God bless SmileAlign. Let people be healed through your service. 

Thank you, 
Varghese

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Had an amazing experience here, I couldn’t even make out the change.  The work was smooth and effective. Highly recommended for all your dental problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: Dr Shivanand V , is a marvellous human being beyond being a doctor who follows the medical morale and ethics which is rare these days. Was in mere urgency to meet an Orthodontist for all mess ups complicated thing which happened to me Witt the braces , hence after a thorough research I found dr Shivanand as the best option for the second line of complicated treatment.I met him today and iam extremely convinced with his Knowledge , Solution oriented approach. To conclude my husband and I have decided to switch on to dr Shivanand as soon as possible and to start off the treatment. I am going to post another detailed review about our case complication ,progression everything in detail in my next review. Hoping for the best. Dr Shivanand is the only hope now . Iam  confident he will do his best.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had severe tooth pain that I got checked out wednesday and what I feared was exactly what I thought. A root canal. I have massive dental fear and I avoid the dentist at all cost. At first impression they seemed real kind and answered all my questions. I felt comfortable enough to make am appointment. The next day the pain increased and didnt know what to do. I tried to push through the day and try to work through the pain. By time I got home the pain was so unbearable that I couldn't take it anymore. I called up clinic for an appointment and The next morning the front office called me to check on me. She gave me the first available appointment for Friday and got an anitbiotic also painkillers. It helped me a lot.
On Saturday both Doctors took very good care of me during the procedure. The procedure took longer than anticipated but they worked together to finish the first part. I'm so happy with my service. I hate going to the dentist. Its one of my biggest fears. I highly recommend anyone with dental anxiety to come to this facility. They are kind, gentle, and go out of their way to make sure you are comfortable and safe. I'm so impressed. In fact I am happy to go again. Thank you!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My experience of the VitaSmiles Dental and its staff has been absolutely excellent. From the free initial assessment to the treatment itself, their care, professionalism and expertise has been outstanding. I chose VitaSmiles after an initial visit and consultation with Dr Shivanand who is so sound on diagnosis and giving a plan which is practical and easy on pocket too. Dr Shivanand is quite simply the dentist who is foremost I have ever had dental treatment with. His team are also superb , making the whole experience first class. I honestly can say I experienced no pain, and not once did I feel anything but total confidence and relaxed in the hands of Dr Shivanand and his team. My treatment included implants, root canal surgery, bridges and crowns and the cost of this has been an enormous saving over what it would have cost in the UK. I would say to anybody considering dental work, visit VitaSmiles Dental Clinic, get a professional opinion of what needs to be done from some of the finest dentists in Bangalore and then place your trust in them. I really am so pleased I decided to use them for the work I needed , and I would like to add that in no way whatsoever am I being paid or rewarded for my comments. I just feel that when you have an incredible experience then you should tell people about it ! My thanks to Dr Shivanand and his team, and all the staff for making my experience an absolutely brilliant one!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I give this dentist 5 gold stars ... But its worth a billion  . Kindest and most caring clinic I have ever been to and very clean .. I use to hate going to the dentist . But after finding VitaSmiles . I now have all the confidence visiting the dentist whenever.  I actually love visiting VitaSmiles . They treat me with kindness along with loving care ...  Dr Shivanand is the most wonderful man .  He really shows passion and love in his work  ..  Very gentle as well ...He gives 100% care in his patients ..  He is also a super nice genuine gentleman . I highly recommend his amazing skills to anyone having problems with their teeth like myself ... But not to worry . I am on my way to getting my dream smile....So far with my visits it is looking very promising that my final result will be the Lamborghini of teeth ..I CANT WAIT 😁 . His team are very kind as well and offer excellent service . . I love visiting this place . You feel comfortable and well looked after here from the moment you walk in the door  ...  I always get good vibes from all of them ... As we all know . Going to the dentist is always a downer.  But when you meet Dr Shivanand and his team at VitaSmile . That will all change for you like it did for myself . You will love going to the dentist just like i do now . Hehe .

Thank you VitaSmiles!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ********** ****** *** ** ** *** ** *** **** ******* ******* **** * **** **** ******** You are in the best of hands from the time you initially walk in to the office, with promptly being checked in for your appointment then greeted by your doctor to start your treatment. Their offices are modern, and extremely clean with a lovely set up. I have only had my cleaning by Dr Shivanand, and only reason why I have requested for his time and time again is due to his overall professionalism, passion for his craft, warm energy and thorough ability to clean my teeth. He is always a pleasure to see and most importantly talk to during my visits to catch up with one another lives and crack jokes throughout the appointment together to make the process more enjoyable. Dr Shivanand is extremely patient as well and offers me break times if needed, but I have always been a person to enjoy wellness and cleaning my teeth where I have now become one of his patient who looks forward to my cleanings just to have the luxury of passing the tip of my tongue on my teeth to feel how squeaky clean they are after I see him. Thank you to both VitaSmiles Dental & Shivanand for always having my teeth in the best of shape! Highly recommended, you won't be disappointed with your decision to give them a try!

review: The doctor is polite and professional and appears to bear in mind the  convenience  and interests of the patient.

Thank you

review: I've been visiting smile align dental hospitals from past 2 years and the hospital is very clean and hygiene and our problems are taken care and doctor is very friendly and response us back if we have any requests ,and the staff members are also very polite over all it was very comfortable journey of mine i would strongly suggest u if you are looking for any ortho related appointment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited Dr. Shivanand due to a cavity issue in my wisdom tooth and it had to be extracted. I had many apprehensions and questions, but Dr. Shivanand explained the problem clearly, queries were answered patiently, procedure was done smoothly and the post procedure instructions were provided neatly. Tooth was extracted in the afternoon, and I was feeling quite fine by evening...no swelling or pain! I would certainly recommended Dr.Shivanand and his team!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Shivanand V ,beyond being an excellent, competent doctor he follows such ethics in his profession.  I just love everything about him. He takes such efforts to make his patients line of treatment so perfect . Iam happy that Iam under safer hands for my braces treatment. I shall post the detailed review once I finish the same . His patience to hear you completely is so commendable I mean no deaf ears for simple to complex issues. Thank you once again   to Dr Shivanand and his team.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I've been visiting SmileAlign Dental for 3 years, and have been very happy with the service received. Reasonably priced, well equipped and the staff is amazing. My visits started with a molar extraction and replacement with an implant. Dr. Shivanand and associates did a great job and the procedure was smooth. I also had difficult fillings done with success. Everyone is caring and works as a team. Highly recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My daughter received treatment here and what a transformation!!! It has even inspired me to start my journey of Invisalign myself! First let me start off with the staff. The doctors and their assistants are super professional. They answer all of your questions and treat everyone equal. My daughter always felt comfortable here! Please don’t hesitate to try them out! I can go on and on about their service.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Straightening of teeth ( Invisalign ) - Removable option,
review: Am very much happy with the results... got the results in very less time... many thanks to Dr.Shivanand for helping me with proper treatment instructions and achieving results in quick time during this pandemic... he is really knowledgeable, helping and best at his work... thanks a lot 😊

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,

The care and guidance that they offer is excellent. Their Hebbal office is not flashy but they match it up with the treatment experience. They are skilled, knowledgeable, and caring professionals. I highly recommend Dr. Shivanand and his staff without reservation.

Dr Soukhya and Dr Sanjay were very professional and gave me a very good RCT. 

They were very patient and understanding as this procedure is very painful, however they explained the nature of the procedure and performed it smoothly. 

Thanks you, 
Kind regards
Abhijeet.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My experience has been nothing less than Amazing. The changes I observed in the past 10 months is something I wanted since my childhood. Dr Shivanand is the pillar of strength at SmileAlign Dental. He simply  carries out with elan, that what was explained at the start of the treatment.**** ******* *** ** *** **** ** ********** Prices are average, staff are good and friendly, is very safe and protocols seems more than what is required which give a peace of mind during these COVID times.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Major reason behind choosing Dr. Shivanand, as he's orthodontist. Getting braces treatment from orthodontist is important as you can reach out to him whenever you face any problems. In every visit Dr. Shivanand gave enough time to understand my problems and helped with proper treatment. Also I would like to highlight about his quality treatment. He was available whenever I faced problems, during my dental braces treatment. I couldn't find any cons in his treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doc Shivanand Is very courteous. He really took the pain to explain me my tooth condition in all the detailed way and was so patient in listening to my queries. What sets him apart is his caring and cheerful nature. ** *** **** ********* ** *** ******* *** never forces his opinions on the patient, which is so hard to find in doctors these days.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had undergone Implant treatment in SmileAlign dental clinic, Hebbal three months back..so far didn't have any discomfort with the treatment and I got very well used with the crown. Thank you Dr. for giving that support and comfort throughout the treatment. Nice talking to u Dr. it was a pleasant experience in your clinic.

He has best in-house Medical team to take care of patients. I had very good treatment from Dr shivanand and team. ************ **  *** ** *** **** ******* ** **********

Dr. Shivanand is very polite and give importance to every patients and he is flexible. This is best quality, I've most liked. He don't hesitate to explain problems whatever we asked for regarding dental. He is always ontime at hospital making sure he respect other's time value. I'd highly recommend everyone, one must visit his dental hospital.

Thankyou Dr Shivanand sir😊

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
He explained the process very well. He was very careful during the entire procedure so that it doesn’t pain while he is working fixing my tooth. 

Very affordable treatment. I Would definitely recommend him.

One thing which I really liked that , after the treatment later in the evening I got a follow up text from the doctor for just checking up on me. I really appreciate this kind of gesture from any doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I wanted to thank you for the great treatment I received at your dental clinic. Everyone was really friendly and made me feel welcome.

The people who treated me were really good and explained everything to me so that I could understand especially Dr Shuvanand who seem to be the core of the team. They made sure I was comfortable and happy during the whole thing.

The clinic was really clean and new which made me feel good about being there. Thank you so much for taking care of me so well!

I'll definitely tell my friends about SmileAlign Dental.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Shivanand from SmileAlign dental has received positive reviews from many patients. Based on that I had booked an appointment. And I was not to be disappointed. I was absolutely impressed with his attention to detail and the thoroughness of his work. He was very meticulous, ensures that everyone receives the individualized care they need to achieve optimal dental health. Moreover, Dr. Shivanand had a gentle touch and a calming presence, which was especially reassuring for me who has dental anxiety. I have to praise his ability to make me feel comfortable and at ease, even during more invasive procedures.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I came for an orthodontic consultation and was very pleased with the superb service provided by Dr Shivanand, Dr Zara and the team. I now have a better understanding and clearer mind after the consultation. What I liked about Dr Shivanand was that he went through all the treatments options possible for my case. Everyone was efficient and nice from the time I step into the clinic to the time I was checked out. I would highly recommend my family and friends who are seeking for a great orthodontist with a dedicated team! 👍

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
After spending years of having caps put on my chipped front teeth I finally decided to look into getting veneers. Dr Shivanand and the team did an amazing job! My smile has never looked so perfect! I am beyond happy with the results, Shivanand was so wonderful, the procedures were comfortable and practically pain free.
Having my two front teeth replaced with veneers was very daunting at first but Dr Shivanand was so caring and really I can’t thank him enough for his kindness and professionalism, attention to detail and my new eye catching smile

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Absolutely brilliant team! I’ve avoided dentists for sometime until now. Such a friendly and lovely group of professionals who are very accommodating. I know that my teeth are always safe in their hands.
Dr Shivanand was extremely efficient and reliable. He really looks at holistic care of teeth.
I’ve had quite a bit of work done on my teeth with this team, from crowns to emergencies to a general cleaning. Everything was done with great care and attention to detail.
Definitely would recommend! **** ****** **** ****** **

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Chipped Tooth,Gap Closing,Cosmetic/ Aesthetic Dentistry,Teeth Reshaping,
review: Dr. Shivanand is truly invested in your journey. The first time I visited the clinic, my issues were identified spot on, there was a gap being formed in my front two teeth due to my bite being improper. Doctor suggested that I should right away wear braces to solve this issue totally. I wore it for about 5 months. It's an art that only experts can do and I was in safe hands. I was always excited to visit the clinic for my check ups because, the wait time is very less and the entire team is happy to receive you and are very cooperative.Dr. Shivanand is an extremely passionate doctor with high level skills that he performs with ease along with customer satisfaction as his highest priority, a rare blend! Highly recommended for any dentals concerns :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I’ve been there a couple of times, so far, to get a check on my wisdom tooth that was extremely hurting (I could barely chew or swallow). They managed to get the problem solved in just a few minutes and gave me a lot of tips and suggestions to avoid future relapses.
During the check they also found out that I had some cavities that needed some attention. I managed to get another appointment after very few days and they very professionally solved the problem.
The staff are good, helpful and professional.
Prices are very good.
I can only recommend the clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was treated by Dr Shivananda for an emergency crown at 4pm on a Sunday. His care and attentiveness is superb and I was impressed with the way he handled multiple patients so late on a Sunday with relative ease considering he was a one-man show. The crown colour was not precise (but I guess artificial tooth cannot replace natural ones) how we had pictured it and he offered to redo it for free when I did my teeth whitening at a later stage. His bedside manner and informative style put me at ease and I came out 4 hours later with a complete, smile. I will return to them for further treatments due to the good service and attention I received.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I’m delighted to have an opportunity to provide a review of SmileAlign Dental, located at RT nagar.
My wife and I were patients of a another practice for over 30 years, and have remained following the changeover with Shivanand couple of years ago.
The practice has continued the quality professional dental services and I have every confidence that my needs and that of my family will be met in a timely and effective manner.
The staff are wonderful and make you feel comfortable and relaxed.
I would have no hesitation in recommending them  to anyone in need of dental services.
- David

It's weird, but my teeth also has an effect on people now. :-) SmileAlign and especially Dr Shivanand and his associates, made this experience the best!!! You don't have to spend a lot on getting your teeth whiter. Make an appointment at SmileAlign, I promise you, you won't be disappointed.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I am sorry to inform you this time am not satisfied why Because  you ****** have to understand  current situation you ****** simply charged extra amount. No value of money.. 😢😥😥
reply_text:
Dear Rasbina,

Thank you for your valuable feedback.
At the outset we would like to thank you for a positive acknowledgement on your previous treatment experiences with us. At the same time, we are unhappy to know that you were disappointed with the charges this time although you did not take the treatment from us. 

The current COVID crisis is a testing and trying one not just for patients and doctors but most of the population. More so for dentists especially as they have to work in the oral cavity and risk is as much as 100% transmission chances if a positive COVID patient is encountered. Since our screening protocols are strict we are sure that we might not encounter a “sick” COVID patient but there could be certain ASYMPTOMATIC COVID patients who show absolutely normal characteristics and parameters in the screening regulations. Hence we have to follow protocols set by the Government of India, Dental Council of India and Health & Family Welfare, Karnataka State inorder to safeguard and minimize the transmission of the disease to the patients, doctors, associate staff and the community at large.
To implement this, we will require DISPOSABLE Personal Protective Equipments (PPE). Some of them are:
1.	Non woven coverall gown ( For doctor and assistant)
2.	N95 masks (For doctor and assistant)
3.	Protective eyewear (For doctor and assistant)
4.	Face shield (For doctor and assistant)
5.	Additional 3ply masks and gloves

So the additional charges enforced upon you were for the above. These cost around Rs 1000-1500 for the good quality and the Government approved ones. A simple Google search will enable you to confirm and have a basic idea on costs of these in the market. The same was actually added along with the procedure cost to you. The procedure cost was unchanged from last time when you had approached us in the month of February. 

I hope you now understand the reason behind the increase in the costs which inturn is because of increase in the costs of the PPEs. We have already written a mail to the Government of Karnataka to help us curb the corruption which exists in certain sectors who are making using of the situation and are increasing the cost of the PPEs by 200-300%. Hopefully we get a positive and a hasty response. In the meantine, We would want to affirm and ensure that patient, staff and community safety is of prime importance to us at this crucial juncture and will continue to follow the protocols that is safe and accurate.

Thanks & regards,
Team SmileAlign

review: Dr Shiva has restored my faith in dentists - he is absolutely excellent. I lost faith last year when another dental practice quoted over Rs 40,000 of dental treatment. Dr Shiva reassured me that all I clinically need at the moment is a deep clean and a mouth guard. If you want an honest opinion from a trusted professional who has your best interests at heart, pick Dr Shiva's. After 10 years of jumping from practice to practice, I have finally found someone I want to return to.
